official_title: A bill to amend chapter 36 of title 44, United States Code, to require reporting regarding the security of cloud computing products and services.
short_title: Federal Cloud Risk Management Improvements Act

summary.text:
Federal Cloud Risk Management Improvements Act

This bill requires the General Services Administration to submit to Congress a report that includes a review of measures taken under the Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program, or any successor program, to ensure the security of data stored or processed by cloud service providers.
